metadata.title: CVE-2016-10189 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: BitlBee before 3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a file transfer request for a contact that is not in the contact list.

criterions.comment: bitlbee package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5-2').
